topics.title: WorldWeaver Help
topics.string:
Welcome to the WorldWeaver help system.

If you are new to Interactive Fiction games use:
help if

While you are playing a game, to execute the command you
just entered again, use:  ^

While you are playing a game use the following to view the
game's help system:
?

To view the WorldWeaver menu use:
menu

If you are building games as opposed to playing them, use:
_help
